special_attacks: breath weapon (60-ft. cone, 18d6 acid damage, Reflex DC 26 half, usable every 1d4 rounds), crush, delirious breath, dragon fury (2d6 acid), mythic power (8/day, surge +1d10), swallow whole (2d6 bludgeoning and 2d6 acid damage, AC 24, 34 hp), tail sweep (DC 26, 2d6+19)
immune: acid, dragon traits, paralysis, poison, sleep

spells.spell-like abilities:
(CL 21st; concentration +27)

At will-arcane eye, charm person (DC 17), entangle (DC 17), plant growth, suggestion (DC 19)

spells.sorcerer spells known:
(CL 11th; concentration +17)

5th (5/day)-polymorph, teleport

4th (7/day)-dimension door, ice storm, scrying (DC 20)

3rd (7/day)-dispel magic, displacement, haste

2nd (8/day)-alter self, detect thoughts (DC 18), locate object, mirror image, see invisibility

1st (8/day)-magic missile, shield, silent image (DC 17), summon monster I, ventriloquism (DC 17)

feats: Alertness, Blinding Critical, Cleave, Critical FocusM, Flyby Attack, Great Cleave, Improved Critical (bite)M, Improved Critical (claws)M, Iron WillM, Multiattack, Power Attack
senses: blindsense 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., low-light vision, greensight; Perception +32
description: Strange shapes dart about within the acrid fog surrounding this green-scaled dragon, and a large horn rises from its snout.

sections.body: The dragon can use Stealth to hide in any sort of natural terrain, even if the terrain does not grant cover or concealment.
sections.name: Camouflage

sections.body: Creatures who fail their saves against the dragon's breath weapon are either confused or nauseated for 1 round. The dragon chooses which effect to apply when it uses its breath weapon, and it can use only one effect per breath.
sections.name: Delirious Breath

sections.body: A green dragon can breathe underwater indefinitely and can freely use its breath weapon, spells, and other abilities while submerged.
sections.name: Water Breathing

sections.body: A mythic green dragon embodies the confusion and fear of becoming lost in a strange forest. It stalks its prey with surprising stealth and subterfuge, preferring the taste of terrified, maddened creatures.

special_qualities: camouflage, dragon cantrips, trackless step, water breathing, woodland stride
name: Dragon, Green, Mythic
skills: Fly +9, Knowledge (arcana, local, and naturel) +28, Perception +32, Sense Motive +6, Spellcraft +28, Stealth +11, Survival +28, Swim +45, Use Magic Device +30
